overview: John McGrory is founder and CEO of ClassOne Insight, the provider of the innovative “InfoStream” service for enterprise reporting and analytics. Prior to ClassOne, John led three other enterprise software and service companies, all of which were focused on both achieving dramatic improvements in customersâ€™ business performance and delivering high levels of customer service. John was founder and CEO of Edge Dynamics, a leading provider of channel commerce management solutions for the life sciences industry; CEO of RedKlay, a provider of ERP and commerce solutions to discrete manufacturers; and founder and CEO of Applicast, an application service provider delivering ERP and CRM solutions.
